name: ListBusinessBreakTypes
description:
Retrieve a list of BreakType instances for a business.

This tool provides a paginated list of BreakType instances associated with a business. Use it to fetch information about different break types configured in a business's system.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_id
parameters.description: Filter results to only include BreakTypes associated with a specific location.

value_schema.description:
Filter the returned `BreakType` results to only those that are associated with the
specified location.

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of BreakType results to return per page, between 1 and 200. Default is 200.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of `BreakType` results to return per page. The number can range between 1
and 200. The default is 200.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pointer to the next page of BreakType results for retrieval.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `BreakType` results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description:
Filter the returned `BreakType` results to only those that are associated with the
specified location.

value_schema.description:
Filter the returned `BreakType` results to only those that are associated with the
specified location.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of `BreakType` results to return per page. The number can range between 1
and 200. The default is 200.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of `BreakType` results to return per page. The number can range between 1
and 200. The default is 200.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pointer to the next page of `BreakType` results to fetch.

value_schema.description: A pointer to the next page of `BreakType` results to fetch.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
